author: Amanda Wilson

review: A friend who installs high-end home theatre systems/security systems and home automation systems kept telling me about the Fire TV Stickand how great it is,  especially since my wife and I are Amazon Prime members.Well, we finally caved and bought one.I can't say enough good things about it !!!Easy to install and set-up,  high quality components,  and even though there is no voice feature,  the remote works perfectly, is very intuitiveand simple to use. (The cartoon guy during set up was a nice touch Amazon programmers)Our WiFi base is upstairs and at the far end of the house and the Fire TV reception is "almost" flawless.during a one hour episode of "Game of Thrones" the system had a two second freeze up,  and that was it.so that's not even worth reporting, but anyone who uses this kind of tech should be realistic and realize that NOTHING is perfect.This device is not for everyone, but I have to give it my highest praise and recommend Fire TV Stick to anyone interested.
